Author: Ame Masami
Name: Deep Dungeon Helper
Description: Tracks traps & Accursed Hoard in Palace of The Dead and Heaven on High
Changelog:
- Moved the backend onto AWS
-Added version checking to new location data
-Made some database functions run async to avoid hangs on zone changes
-Limited the zone lookups to only happen when entering a PotD/HoH zone
-Renamed to Deep Dungeon Helper from PotD Helper
Punchline: Tracks traps & Accursed Hoard in Palace of The Dead and Heaven on High
